channel.title: P Hat Help
channel.description: how do i make it so u have to click a npc to get blue p hat but u have to have d claws and 2147m (d claw id 6587)? please help.

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Put it in the correct section of your client class.

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @Psycotix Psycotix
item.description:
@Psycotix wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:28, topic:272396”]When will you people learn?

Packet 155.

case npcid: if (playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) && playerHasItem(6587, 1)) { addItem(1042, 1); } else { //else } break;[/quote]
In 3 years, just like you.
Thanks babe I really needed this too <3

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

When will you people learn?

Packet 155.

case npcid: if (playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) && playerHasItem(6587, 1)) { addItem(1042, 1); } else { //else } break;

client.java:19626: cannot find symbol symbol : variable NPCID location: class client if (NPCID == 329) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

This might work if his doesn’t. I just had a problem like this.

        if (NPCID == ####) {
            if(playerHasItem(6587, 1)
  && playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) ) {

          removeItem(6587, 1);
          removeItem(995, 2147000000);

          addItem(1042, 1);
          sM("You get a Blue PartyHat.");
       }

}

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[code] if (NPCID == ####) {
if((playerHasItemAmount(6587, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(995, 2147000000) ==true)){
deleteItem(6587, GetItemSlot(6587), 1);
deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), 2147000000);

          addItem(1042, 1);
          sM("You get a Blue PartyHat.");
    } else {
          sM(" you need blah blah to buy a phat.");
    }

}[/code] ok that works fine in my server… put it in case 155: in client class.

Read full topic

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

        if (NPCID == ####) {
            if(playerHasItem(6587, 1) 
	&& playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) {

		    removeItem(6587, 1);
		    removeItem(995, 2147000000);

		    addItem(1042, 1);
		    sM("You get a Blue PartyHat.");

}

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Okay.

case ####: //portal or npc id

          if(playerHasItem(6587, 1) 
        && playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) {

		removeItem(6587, 1);
		removeItem(995, 2147000000);
        
            addItem(1042, 1);
		  sM("You get a Blue PartyHat.");
    }

}

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help

@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

:\ i want it so they have to pay for it 2147m and d claws (d claws id 6587)

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

If the person is a donator, it gives them a blue phat.

Then it turns the donator to 2.

Then they can’t use it again. (:

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

whats it do?

Read full topic

item.title: P Hat Help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Here’s an easy way to solve this.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Blue") && donator == 1) { addItem(1042, 1); donator = 2; } else { sM("You already got your Blue PartyHat!"); }

Fix any mistakes I made.

Read full topic
